name: Soul Surge
description:
🧙‍♂️ You are a greedy wizard who has made a pact with the god of death to grant you power in exchange for your service. You can sacrifice your life in order to gain more power. But be careful, everytime you die you lose a fragment of your soul. Die too many times and your soul will get stretched too thin to be recovered!

Controls
WASD to move
Space / Left Mouse to attack

Tools used

  • Unity 2019.1
  • Photoshop CC

We will be making a video about the creation of the game and sharing it on our YouTube Channel... Stay tuned!

Created by Asbjørn Thirslund from Brackeys.
